org.xlattice.corexml.om

Class Document

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xlattice.corexml.om.Node
      • org.xlattice.corexml.om.Holder
        • org.xlattice.corexml.om.Document

  • public class Document
extends Holder
    An XML Document, a Holder which can contain only one Element in its NodeList, has no attributes, and no namespaces.
    Author:
    Jim Dixon

      • toXml

        public java.lang.String toXml()
        Generate the XML document in String form. The standard XML declaration is prefixed. This method traverses the entire document recursively. The document is not indented.
        Specified by:
        toXml in class Node
        Returns:
        the entire document in String form
